extendedInfo.description: ************************************************************JUST RELEASED- ANIMAL GAMES FOR KIDS: PUZZLES! GET IT NOW FOR FREE! THANKS!************************************************************Do your kids love trucks? Do they love puzzles? Look no further. Kids Trucks: Puzzles is a fun animated puzzle game for toddlers , preschoolers and kids from ages 1 to 6.Features:* 13 different truck puzzles to choose from.* Bright and fun truck animations when the puzzles are completed!* Positive encouragement.* Fireworks or paint bubbles to pop at the end of each puzzle!* Increasing difficulty with each puzzle.* Easy for toddlers and young kids to use and control. Please note that this is the free version of the app. The free version includes four puzzles with the option to unlock the other 9 via in-app purchase. If you like Kids Trucks: Puzzle, please check out our other apps: Kids Trucks Preschool Learning, Kids Trucks Numbers & Counting, and Construction Alphabet.=====================================If you enjoy this app, please take a look at all of our fun and educational apps for kids:Kids Trucks: PuzzlesKids Trucks: Numbers & CountingKids Trucks: Alphabet Letter Identification GamesKids Trucks: Preschool LearningKids Trucks: Construction AlphabetAnimal Games for Kids: PuzzlesMonster Games for Kids: Jigsaw PuzzlesFairy Tale Games: Mermaid Princess PuzzlesFlower Fairies Ballet: Fairy Ballerina Puzzles for KidsPuzzle Maker for Kids: Create Your Own Jigsaw Puzzles from PicturesIf you have questions, need support, or have a suggestion, please email us at: orionsmason@gmail.comKNOW What's Inside:As a MOMs with Apps member, we follow the "KNOW what's inside" best practices for kids' apps. For more information go to: http://momswithapps.com/=====================================Privacy Policy -This app:- Does not contain ads- Does not contain links to social networks- Does not use data collection tools- Does contain an in-app purchase for the full versionFor more information on our privacy policy, please visit: http://orionsmason.wordpress.com/privacy-policy/

reviews.comment: not bad,kids  are enjoyed
reviews.author: Mohamed Faizal

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: My son loves it
reviews.author: Mimi Cole

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: My little boy loves this. Thanks
reviews.author: Michael Clews

reviews.title: What!
reviews.comment: There\'s about 4 levels free! My brother was busy for 5 minutes until he came in bored! Will rate higher if more free levels are added.
reviews.author: Max Tordoff

reviews.title: Keeps my kids entertained..
reviews.comment: My 2 years old has been able to match items.. Good game.
reviews.author: Fendy Saadon

reviews.title: A total con
reviews.comment: Do not pay for the full version. I paid \302\2431.23 to unlock the full version and it will not open. It just keeps saying you already own this content then does not open. I\'m still waiting on my refund.
reviews.author: craig mcwilliams

reviews.title: haziq
reviews.comment: haziq
reviews.author: Mohd Zikri Ramli

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Great puzzles for my almost 4 year old daughter!  Keeps her busy!
reviews.author: Meghan Weaver

reviews.comment: My 3 year old loves this.........juzt wish there were more free puzzles
reviews.author: Sjoy Richardson

reviews.title: Cute for little ones
reviews.comment: Cute, simple puzzles for early learners with sound effects and a reward at the end.  5 stars for stating there are in-app purchases, and for having parental lock features to store links etc. This is the way a lite version for kids should be. I will definitely look for more apps from this developer.
reviews.author: Amy Taylor

reviews.title: Super fun for my toddler
reviews.comment: Only wish you could adjust accuracy based on age, but my almost 3 year old could play this all day!
reviews.author: Sarah Dawkins

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: My little boy loves this app. But could do with some more free levels
reviews.author: Gemma Norman

reviews.title: Liked it...
reviews.comment: Especially like the parent button! I know there are ads on the free version but appreciate that when I hand my phone to my toddler that they are not being redirected to some other site without my knowledge. The game and graphics are nice and easy to maneuver.
reviews.author: Tameka Singleton

reviews.comment: my 2 yr old loves playing this. keeps him busy while letting me rest!
reviews.author: mamasel dakis

reviews.title: Need screen lock
reviews.comment: My son loves it, but often hits the back button and exits the game. A screen lock or parental lock would be great.
reviews.author: Michael Jones

reviews.title: 3 year old loves it
reviews.comment: My son can\'t get enough of these puzzles. He does them every day and every chance he gets. We have it installed on 2 phones and a tablet.
reviews.author: Brian McKenna

reviews.title: My kids luv it
reviews.comment: My kids luvd it. Great puzzles.
reviews.author: Sonia Perales

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: My son plays it all day and loves it.
reviews.author: Crystal Collis

reviews.title: Great. Luv it
reviews.comment: Fab
reviews.author: Sheena Nolan

reviews.title: Great App! Got my purchase back : )
reviews.comment: My son loves this app, he finished all the puzzle when he was 1 year and 8 months old. He\'s very good at puzzles now. Thanks for the help!
reviews.author: Jacqueline Quinto
